Master Answer:
Household and close contacts of immunocompromised individuals can be immunized with Measles, Mumps, Rubella (MMR) Vaccine and no special precautions need to be taken post MMR immunization, regardless of whether or not a post-vaccine rash occurs. If you have any further questions, speak with your immunizing health care provider.
Immunization Nurse
